results.title: Manyu-Wana 3
results.creator_credit: David Batty, Wendy Baarda and Warlpiri Media
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Manyu-Wana (A)”.
This episode covers the following topics: Children playing; dampers magic-number 6; exercising for health, showing football and basketball matches between communitites; spear-throwing at Yuendumu Sports; reading of “The Story about the Snake and the Mouse”; words for ‘heavy’ and ‘light’; colours; cleaning and grinding of bush seeds for seed cakes. Suitable for Primary, seconday and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with Englsih subtitles.

results.title: The Mill on the floss
results.creator_credit: Graham Theakston, Brian Eastman, BBC and Carnival Films
results.brief_description: Driven by passion, intelligence and imagination, Maggie Tulliver ia a rare free spirit in the convention-bound world of Victorian rural society. Despite the fierce love between her and her stolid but resourceful brother Tom, who is incapable of understanding Maggie’s waywardly emotional nature, she turns to others for the companionship she craves. Denied the friendship of Philip Wakem, the son of her father’s implacable enemy, she meets and is drawn irresistibly to the young and handsome Stephen Guest. Torn between love and devotion to her family, she is rejected by Tom and only an act of supreme courage can effect a final but tragic reconciliation. Filmed in the beautiful rural heartlands of England, this outstanding new production is a vivid portrayal of George Eliot’s compelling story of love, rejection and reconciliation.

results.title: Southern Belle. Part 2
results.brief_description: This video is the second part of Greg Graingers journey into the Southern part of the United States. Visit states such as Tennessee, Louisiana, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi, South Carolina and Florida, take time to meet with a wealth of Southern characters and experience the life and customs of the south in a very upbeat and entertaining manner. Visit Dollywood (centre of the business empire of Dolly Parton) and Gracelands (home of the legendary Elvis Presley), paddlewheel down the Mississippi and travel to Nashville for a country music bonanza.

results.title: What do I tell my children?
results.creator_credit: Leslie Bellis Kussmann and Aquarius Productions
results.brief_description: This video is internationally recognised as the most outstanding available for families and professionals who are dealing with children and grief issues, Children and parents share their stories and feelings about the loss of a loved one, while leading professionals in the field - including Earl Grollman, Elsiabeth Kubler-Ross, Sandra Fox and Anne Kilman - offer advice about coping and grief. It looks at practical advice for dealing with different kinds of bereavement: sibling, parent and grandparent.

results.title: Trouble : Responses to physical and emotional abuse
results.brief_description: Animated Norwegian production aimed at preventing sexual abuse in young children. The documentary begins with notions of uncomplicated ‘trouble’, such as being scared of a dog or not cleaning your room. There is a bigger item on the agenda, sexual abuse, and the documentary moves onto the area in an open and frank way. There is a case study presented of a young girl who is sexually abused by her uncle. She describes what happens and how she feels. The solution to her trouble is telling someone, which is the message the film portrays- that telling someone will drive the trouble away. The documentary is confronting in a way which is appropriate to the subject matter and perhaps necessary for instructing children about abuse. A leaflet accompanies the video. No other production detail available.

results.title: Miracle in Milan = miracolo a Milano
results.creator_credit: Vittorio De Sica, Nino Misiano, De Sica Productions and l'E N I C
results.brief_description: Based on the book ‘Toto il Buono’, acclaimed director Vittorio De Sica has produced a captivating fable, co-written by long-time collaborator Cesare Zavattini, mixing his sometimes harsh reality with fantastic characters and events in an increasingly unreal setting. The main character Toto, himself a rescued foundling, is a philanthropist, determined to help his fellow man in the way he was helped by the woman who adopted him. Mingling De Sica’s trademark neo-realism, in this case the shameful treatment of displaced persons after the War, with whimsical fantasy, this film won Best Film award at the 1951 Cannes Film Festival. Italian language with English subtitles.

results.title: Good morning Babylon
results.creator_credit: Paolo Taviani, Vittorio Taviani, Giuliani De Negri, Films A2, Filmtre, MK2 Productions, Pressman Film Corporation and RA11
results.brief_description: The Taviani Brothers’ first English language film is a bitter-sweet and joyous celebration of the early days of Hollywood movie making. Based on a true story, the film is a piece of pure and thrilling cinema and features an acclaimed performance by Charles Dance as the legendary director D.W. Griffith. Two Tuscan stonemason brothers decide to leave Italy for the New World when their father’s firm becomes bankrupt. They travel to Hollywood and wangle their way onto the film set of Griffith. They fall in love and celebrate a double wedding, however war soon intervenes to threaten their happiness.

results.title: Boomerang
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Alcheringa”.
Demonstrates how a boomerang is made. The diligent search for the exact right piece of wood, the burning off of the outer bark, the laborious whittling with a sharpened stone and the fashioning of the slight twist at each end to achieve its unique quality of returning to its point of departure. Introduced by Bill Onus.

results.title: The Amazon awakens
results.creator_credit: Inter-American Affairs and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description: The story of the Amazon River Basin; its history and exploration by early Spanish explorers; its industrial progress; the natural resources and vast riches of this region still awaiting discovery and exploitation.
results.description: The story of the Amazon River Basin; its history and exploration by early Spanish explorers; its industrial progress; the natural resources and vast riches of this region still awaiting discovery and exploitation.
